projects.title: BIMdexter
projects.summary: As Co-Founder and Chief Architect, I built the full web stack from the ground up.

projects.title: KitConnect
projects.summary: Re-architected several key structures, including Revit year handling, overall MVVM pattern, and authentication.

projects.title: DeWALT HangerWorks Pro
projects.summary: Led team of engineers as player-coach to successfully deliver a severely under-budgeted project to extreme customer satisfaction.

projects.title: Dimension Engine Rebuild
projects.summary: Refactored 4,000+ lines of nested logic into an abstract builder/director pattern, allowing for greater extensibility and maintainability.

projects.title: 3D Component Library
projects.summary: Led Reusable Content team to build out component library of 10,000+ Revit families and design modules, including Revit add-in for cut sheets and standardized dimensions pulled from an Azure hosted SQL Server.

projects.title: Select All Like UI Overhaul
projects.summary: Refactored UI into MVVM pattern with more modular and componentized controls and vastly expanded functionality to improve efficiency and productivity of users.

projects.title: Design Data Manager
projects.summary: Architected solution and led team to build a data management suite that improved interdisciplinary coordination between engineering and ensured data consistency between disparate engineering and design software.

projects.title: Banking App
projects.summary: Sample Bank App and ATM UI built with React and Firebase that simulates basic banking transactions.

projects.title: Open Library Book Search
projects.summary: Book search app that leverages OpenLibrary and Amazon's APIs to search book data to illustrate connecting to external APIs and paginating data.

projects.title: Flexible Game Board
projects.summary: Play tic-tac-toe and connect four! This app Illustrates reusability of React Components as both the board and tiles are setup to handle multiple games and tile types.

projects.title: PacMan Game
projects.summary: Create PacMan and Kirby sprites, and let them battle for supremacy! This project illustrates some dynamic interaction with the DOM as well as some physical space awareness.

projects.title: MBTA Transit Tracker
projects.summary: Track realtime location and capacity of MBTA buses. It's great if you're trying to get to MIT!

projects.title: Score Keeper
projects.summary: Simple score keeping app for board games or sports.

projects.title: Eyes Animation
projects.summary: Simple demo of working with css/js/html to animate the DOM and track mouse movement. Plus you get to make a green monster smile!

projects.title: Assembly Manager
projects.summary:
Quick burn interview project. I intentionaly highlighted my approach to Revit API work. In particular: - IExternalCommand.Execute serves as a Procedural outline 
 - Each step in the procedure has its own dev command for integration testing

 - Any functional logic is abstracted out so that it can be unit tested.
